question.text: Which of the following will result in cultural eutrophication?

options.text: It is the natural aging of a lake by nutrient enrichment of its water.
It is caused due to pollutants arising as a result of human activities like effluents from the industries and homes.
It is caused due to the release of organic nutrients
It is caused due to the release of heated effluents.

solution.text:
Pollutants from man’s activities like effluents from the industries and homes can radically accelerate the aging process. This phenomenon has been called cultural or accelerated eutrophication. During the past century, lakes in many parts of the earth have been severely eutrophied by sewage and agricultural and industrial wastes. The prime contaminants are nitrates
and phosphates, which act as plant nutrients.
